paragraphs.text: Last minute Christmas shopping: Five things to avoid.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: This weekend millions of Americans will take to the mall to get last-minute gifts for their loved ones
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They will pour through the already-picked-over selections to try and find "the gift."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For those of you
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: who are forced into the mall this weekend
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I'm sorry
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: Here are five things to avoid as we enter the final shopping days before Christmas
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Believe the best bargains are found
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: you wait until the last minute
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it's true
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: retailers are starting their after-Christmas sales earlier than ever
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: just as the Christmas shopping season starts before you get to Thanksgiving dessert
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: seasoned shoppers know(1) value and(2) bargain do not mean the same thing
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We all know just because something is cheap doesn't mean it's "a bargain" or a "value."
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: It's only a bargain if it is truly something you want or need, and are able to get it at a deep discount
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Often last minute shoppers don't know what they want
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For those shopping this weekend you will have to settle for what circumstances present
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: which in many cases will be cheap materials, but not a bargains
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The value is the ratio of quality (or quantity) to price
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: Low quality at a low price is no value
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: especially when compared to high quality at a low price
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: Values tend go early in the holiday shopping season
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Cheap stays on the shelf until it's all that's left
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Believe there is still money to spend in your budget this month
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Last minute shopping, particularly for December, means buying during the back half of the month
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: That's typically when most income for the month is already committed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: any incremental spending means "borrowing against the future."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It's better to buy early - and spread the purchasing over time - so you can more easily absorb the expense
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Nobody likes that "January surprise."
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: And for new last- minute shoppers, that surprise can be surprisingly BIG!
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Believe you can still find "just the right gift for Uncle George."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Waiting until the last minute to shop means having to make compromises
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Time and selection are your two greatest "friends" when you shop early
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But for last minute shoppers they become your two greatest nightmares
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: you're pressed for time
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: all the best colors, sizes and values, are gone
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Don't put yourself under a lot of pressure to find that perfect gift
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: At this stage in the game, a gift will do
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Believe you still need "just one more" gift
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We should all take a lesson out of Santa's playbook: 1. Make a list. 2. Check it twice
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Too often last minute shopping isn't just an indication you've waited to the bitter end to buy those needed gifts
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It also means you've waited too long to plan that shopping
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: when that happens you're never quite sure if you have all the gifts you need
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: (it seems keeping track of what you've bought is just as hard as planning what to buy in advance!)
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: you keep buying just one more gift... just to make sure you've covered all your bases
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: By the way, that's when shoppers are especially susceptible to impulse buying
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: An attention-arresting display will attract last minute shoppers like honey attracts flies!
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Believe that the shopper has the advantage
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is true that the Saturday before Christmas is still one of the busiest shopping days of the year
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the advantage has swung back in favor of the retailer
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: With fewer hours to shop until Santa fills his sack, the retailer has the upper hand
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: especially if they've had a strong Q4
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For some, shopping the weekend before Christmas can bring the ultimate sense of that holiday experience
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For those who enjoy shopping as a pastime, it's one of the best times to be in the mall
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: for those folks who need to fulfill a shopping list, it can be one of the worst
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The early bird still does get the worm
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And the late bird gets ... the opportunity to pick over the dregs with a lot of other "late birds."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: With the brief time remaining before Christmas, use it to "shop for fun" not for necessity
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It will truly help keep you in the Christmas spirit
paragraphs.label: assumption
